function: If a person puts it in their ear, everything they hear turns into a joke that is very funny.

When consumed, any events said by the user will forcibly occur in the other way around.
It is able to affect subjects any point in the timeline. For example, when Suneo insults Nobita who curses him with the potion's effects, a dog suddenly appears out of nowhere and viciously attacks Suneo, and when Nobita laments on Doraemon's premature departure, the latter suddenly pops out inside his room.

Lie Absorbing Machine is a gadget owned by Doraemon 
Nobita is very upset by his friends because he got fooled again on April Fools Day. He hates April Fools Day very much, and for this reason Doraemon takes out The Lie Absorbing Machine. It absorbs all the lies that people made and prevent someone from talking lies. But if you are absorbing too much lies, the machine will explode.

function: This meter can be used to modify the weight of a person or object. Point the meter towards the thing you want to use it on, and press the one of the buttons on either side. If you want to make it heavier, push the + button, if you want to make it lighter, push the negative (-) button.

Wearing this on one's mouth and lying to someone makes them believe that the spoken lie is true, even though it is actually not. To stop the effect of the gadget, the wearer has to conclude that it is a lie.
